text: well I feel desperately sorry for Teresa
and for Philip I mean she worked
incredibly hard she's a dedicated public
servant and I know what it feels like
when you come to realize that your
leadership time has finished that the
country needs a new leader and it's
extremely difficult and painful to step
outside Downing Street and to say those
things but I think she she is and she
was a dedicated public servant she
worked incredibly hard on our behalf I
think she deserves our gratitude for
that and this would be a very difficult
